I was wondering the same few years ago.
It goes like this
You have the official release date 18 August. Pirates usually get it 10 days before the official release date. How is that possible? Well, even though the official release date is 18 August, stores actually have the blu ray and dvd discs 2 weeks before the official release date. So I'm guessing the pirates have a deal/are friends with the store clerks and that's how they get it.

Noob info - TPB gets it faster because stores in other countries release at earlier dates than the US release date.  Sweden might get it three weeks before the U.S., and then it is ripped in Sweden and uploaded to TPB, two weeks before the U.S. release date.
